description: Take classic cauliflower cheese up a notch with this baked cauliflower recipe. With bacon swirled through the cheese sauce and sprinkled on top, this is sure to be a favourite around the dinner table.
name: Baked Cauliflower & Cheese with Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour sauce over cauliflower, sprinkle with breadcrumbs, remaining bacon and cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden.
